item.title: South Africa vs Pakistan Live Score: South Africa score after 35 overs is 227/7 | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Pakistan Secures Victory Over South Africa by 36 Runs via DLS Method

Date: 23 Dec 2024 | Source: Live Score

Pakistan triumphed over South Africa in the third ODI match, utilizing the DLS method to secure a 36-run victory.

Key Points:

  • Pakistan set a target of 309 runs, scoring 308/9 in 47 overs.
  • Saim Ayub scored a remarkable century (101 runs off 94 balls).
  • South Africa managed 271 runs, getting all out in 42 overs.
  • Heinrich Klaasen was the top scorer for South Africa with 81 runs off 43 balls.
  • Sufiyan Muqeem excelled with the ball, taking 4 wickets for 52 runs.
“OUT! BOWLED! It is all over!”

This match showcased a fierce competition, and with the victory, Pakistan makes a significant mark in the ODI series.

item.title: Champions Trophy: India vs Pakistan on February 23 in UAE - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Champions Trophy: India vs Pakistan on February 23 in UAE

Publication Date: Not provided Source: Not specified

India will play their Champions Trophy 2025 matches in the UAE with a notable match against Pakistan scheduled for February 23.

  • The PCB has chosen the UAE as a neutral venue for the tournament.
  • India's group includes Pakistan, Bangladesh, and New Zealand.
  • India will face Bangladesh on February 20 and New Zealand on March 2.
  • The tournament starts on February 19, with Pakistan facing New Zealand in Karachi.
  • Knockout matches including semi-finals and finals may shift venues based on India's progression.
  • This arrangement is part of a hybrid model agreement between India and Pakistan for future ICC events.
“The PCB has picked the UAE as a neutral venue for the Champions Trophy,” said PCB spokesperson Amir Mir.

In conclusion, the Champions Trophy will showcase India and Pakistan in a significant match amidst a hybrid model designed to accommodate both nations in upcoming ICC events.

item.title: Champions Trophy 2025: India vs Pakistan game to be played on February 23 in UAE - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Champions Trophy: India vs Pakistan on February 23 in UAE

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

India will play their Champions Trophy 2025 matches in the UAE, a decision finalized after discussions with PCB and UAE officials.

  • The India vs Pakistan match is scheduled for February 23.
  • India's group also includes Bangladesh and New Zealand.
  • Pakistan's opening match will be against New Zealand on February 19.
  • All matches are likely to be held in Dubai.
  • The final is set for March 9 in Lahore, with a reserve day.
“The PCB has picked the UAE as a neutral venue for the Champions Trophy,” - Amir Mir, PCB spokesperson.

This decision is part of a hybrid model agreement that ensures neutral venues for certain matches, especially for significant tournaments leading up to 2028.

item.title: Low Bounce, Nothing For Pacers On Practice Pitches: India Train On ‘Flat Tracks’ For Boxing Day Test | Repo - News18
item.description:
India Faces Challenges on Flat Practice Pitches Ahead of Boxing Day Test

Date: December 22, 2024 21:57 IST Source: Times of India

The Indian cricket team is encountering difficulties with the practice pitches at the MCG, leading into the Boxing Day Test. Unlike the conditions expected, the pitches are reported to have lower bounce, which hampers the effectiveness of fast bowlers.

  • Practice pitches at the MCG described as having 'lower bounce' and 'absolutely nothing' for the pace attack.
  • India's quick bowlers struggled to find assistance during the practice session.
  • Australian team has not yet begun their training and may use different pitch conditions.
  • Captain Rohit Sharma faced an injury scare during practice, but it is believed to be minor.
“The Indian captain removed his gear, settled into a chair, and the physio got the ice pack out,” Times of India reported.

The upcoming Boxing Day Test will be crucial for India as they navigate the challenges posed by the pitch conditions and player health.

item.title: After Refusing To Travel To Pakistan, India Will Play Champions Trophy Matches At This Venue - NDTV Sports
item.description:
India and Pakistan's Champions Trophy Matches to be Held in UAE

Publication Date: Not specified Source: NDTV

Pakistan Cricket Board has confirmed that the UAE will serve as the neutral venue for the 2025 Champions Trophy, amidst ongoing political tensions between India and Pakistan.

  • The PCB announced that matches will be played in the UAE, with confirmation sent to the ICC.
  • This decision affects several ICC events through 2027, including the Champions Trophy 2025 and other upcoming World Cups.
  • Political relations between India and Pakistan limit direct competitions, with the last bilateral series occurring in 2012-13.
  • The Champions Trophy is set for February and March 2025, with scheduling details to be announced soon.
  • Pakistan last played India in a T20 World Cup match earlier this year, which India won.
“Due to strained political relations, India and Pakistan only compete in international events like the World Cup and Asia Cup.”

This arrangement underscores the ongoing complexities in cricketing relations between the two countries, now playing out at neutral venues.

item.title: Match report: United 0 Bournemouth 3 - Man Utd
item.description:
Match report: United 0 Bournemouth 3

Date: Sunday 22 December 2024

Source: Manchester United Official Website

Manchester United suffered a disappointing defeat at Old Trafford against Bournemouth with a score of 3-0.

  • A Dean Huijsen header in the 29th minute opened the scoring for Bournemouth.
  • Justin Kluivert extended the lead with a penalty in the 61st minute.
  • Antoine Semenyo scored a third just two minutes later, solidifying Bournemouth's victory.
  • Manchester United struggled to convert their chances, with Bruno Fernandes coming close several times.
  • The match marked a challenging end to United's pre-Christmas schedule.
“It proved to be a day to quickly forget for the Reds.”

Looking forward, Manchester United aims to bounce back in their upcoming fixture against Wolves on Boxing Day.

item.title: Kerala Blasters 3-0 Mohammedan Sporting Highlights: Coeff, Sadaoui score in win vs MSC in ISL 2024-25 - Sportstar
item.description:
Kerala Blasters 3-0 Mohammedan Sporting Highlights: Coeff, Sadaoui score in win vs MSC in ISL 2024-25

Date Published: Dec 22, 2024

Source: Sportstar

This article highlights the Indian Super League game between Kerala Blasters and Mohammedan Sporting, showcasing a dominant performance by the Blasters that led to a 3-0 victory.

  • Kerala Blasters scored their first goal at the 62-minute mark, attributed to goalie error.
  • Noah Sadaoui doubled the lead at the 80-minute mark with a powerful header.
  • Alexandre Coeff sealed the game with a third goal shortly after, ensuring the Blasters' win.
  • This victory helps Kerala Blasters move up the league standings to 10th place.
“Mohammedan Sporting fell like a pack of cards after the own goal.”

The game reflects Kerala Blasters' resurgence in the league following a coaching change, key for their momentum moving forward.

item.title: Brain teaser: If you solve this mind-boggling riddle, the title of maths genius is yours - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Brain teaser: If you solve this mind-boggling riddle, the title of maths genius is yours

Date: Dec 22, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Maths brain teasers are captivating users online, with one particular riddle generating much interest. The riddle presents a unique logic sequence that has left many puzzled, emphasizing the joy of creative problem-solving in mathematics.

Main Points:

  • A riddle shared on social media goes: “5 × 5 = 11, 6 × 6 = 14, 7 × 7 = 17, 8 × 8 = 20, 10 × 10 = ?”
  • The puzzle has gone viral, prompting discussions and various interpretations of the logic behind it.
  • Brain teasers are popular on social media for their ability to engage a wide audience.
  • This riddle draws attention similar to past viral puzzles known for their simplicity and depth.
“The simplicity yet depth of such riddles often draws people in, challenging them to think outside the box.”

Brain teasers serve as a fun challenge and encourage critical thinking, making them a valuable part of online interactions.

item.description:

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

The match between Chelsea and Everton ended in a goalless draw, with Chelsea dominating possession but unable to convert their chances, while Everton defended resolutely under difficult weather conditions.

  • Defensive reshuffle for Chelsea with Gusto and Disasi playing out of position.

  • Ending of Chelsea's eight-match winning streak.
  • Everton has recorded four 0-0 draws in their last six games.
  • Chelsea remains in second place, one point behind Liverpool.

"Carefree."

Chelsea and Everton failed to find a breakthrough in a match characterized by strong defensive play and adverse weather conditions.

item.title: Renuka, Mandhana consign West Indies to record loss - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
India Secures Record Victory Over West Indies in ODI

Date: Not specified | Source: ESPN Cricinfo

In a dominant performance, India defeated the West Indies by 211 runs in the first of three ODIs, with standout contributions from Smriti Mandhana and Renuka Singh.

  • India scored 314 for 9, with Mandhana top-scoring at 91 and Renuka taking 5 wickets for 29 runs.
  • The West Indies managed only 103 runs, folding under pressure from India's bowling attack.
  • Debutant Pratika Rawal scored 40 runs in a solid opening partnership but was also lucky to survive several close calls.
  • Harmanpreet Kaur and other middle-order batsmen provided momentum to the innings towards the end.
  • Renuka's exceptional bowling, particularly her magical in-duckers, led to West Indies' collapse.
“It was no less than a horror show with the bat for the West Indies.”

This record victory sets a stark tone for the West Indies as they prepare for the upcoming 50-over World Cup.

item.title: After Refusing To Travel To Pakistan, India Will Play Champions Trophy Matches At This Venue: Report.. - NDTV Sports
item.description:
India to Play Champions Trophy Matches in Dubai, Not Pakistan

Publication Date: September 9, 2023 Source: NDTV

India has confirmed that they will play their matches in the Champions Trophy at a neutral venue in Dubai, following concerns over security for travel to Pakistan. This decision was made after meetings between cricket officials from the two countries.

  • Dubai selected as the venue for India's Champions Trophy matches.
  • The semi-finals and final are also set to be held in the UAE if India qualifies.
  • The decision follows India's refusal to travel to Pakistan due to security concerns.
  • Hybrid model allows for matches in neutral venues until 2027 for tournaments hosted by either country.
  • The last bilateral engagement between India and Pakistan was in 2012.
“India had refused to travel to Pakistan for the event scheduled in February-March due to security concerns.”

The announcement of the tournament's final schedule is expected soon, with Pakistan set to host 9 to 10 matches.

item.title: Sara Tendulkar vs. Manu Bhaker: Net worth comparison; who is richer? - India.com
item.description:
Sara Tendulkar vs. Manu Bhaker: Who Has a Higher Net Worth?

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: India.com

This article compares the net worth of Sara Tendulkar, the daughter of cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar, with that of India's Olympic shooter Manu Bhaker to determine who is wealthier.

  • Sara Tendulkar's estimated net worth is reported to be Rs 1 crore.
  • Manu Bhaker's estimated net worth is reported to be Rs 12 crore.
  • Manu Bhaker is confirmed to be wealthier than Sara Tendulkar with a net worth of Rs 12 crore.
"With a net worth of Rs 11 crore, Manu Bhaker is richer than Sara Tendulkar."

The comparison shows that despite Sara's famous lineage, Manu Bhaker holds a significantly higher net worth.

item.title: Renuka Singh, Smriti Mandhana lead India to record-breaking win against West Indies in ODI series opener - India TV News
item.description:
Renuka Singh, Smriti Mandhana lead India to record-breaking win against West Indies in ODI series opener

Publication Date: December 22, 2024 | Source: India TV News

In a remarkable display, the Indian women's cricket team triumphed over West Indies, securing a 211-run victory in the first ODI match. Smriti Mandhana starred with the bat, scoring 91 runs, while Renuka Singh showcased her bowling prowess with a five-wicket haul.

  • India posted a total of 314 runs after being sent in to bat first.
  • Smriti Mandhana scored 91 runs, marking her fifth consecutive 50+ score in international cricket.
  • Renuka Singh achieved her first five-wicket haul, helping dismiss West Indies for just 103 runs.
  • Captain Harmanpreet Kaur returned from injury and facilitated a winning debut for Pratika Rawal, who scored 40 runs.
  • This win marks India's biggest victory by runs against a full-time member nation in women's ODIs.
“Mandhana continued her red-hot form by scoring her fifth consecutive 50+ score in international cricket.”

The Indian women's cricket team has demonstrated their dominance in the ODI series opener and will aim to carry this momentum forward in upcoming matches.

item.title: 'I laugh when comparisons are made between Virat Kohli and Babar Azam...': Ex-Pakistan star makes merciless remark - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Mohammad Amir Laughs Off Comparisons Between Virat Kohli and Other Players

Published on: Dec 22, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Former Pakistan cricketer Mohammad Amir has praised Virat Kohli as the greatest batter of the current generation, starkly dismissing comparisons with players such as Babar Azam, Steve Smith, and Joe Root.

  • Amir emphasizes that Kohli's consistency and match-winning ability across all formats set him apart from his peers.
  • He highlights Kohli's exceptional work ethic, especially in his comeback after 2014.
  • Amir recalls the importance of Kohli's wicket in the 2017 Champions Trophy final for Pakistan's victory.
“Virat Kohli is the greatest player of this generation. I laugh when comparisons are made between him and Babar Azam, Steve Smith, or Joe Root...” - Mohammad Amir

Amir also reminisced about dismissing Sachin Tendulkar during the 2009 Champions Trophy, describing it as a special moment in his career.

In conclusion, Amir firmly believes that Kohli's legacy as a cricketer is unmatched and will remain significant in the annals of cricket history.

item.title: D Gukesh’s father names Indian Grandmaster for ‘big role’ in World Chess C’ship win: 'He invited to his home after...' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
D Gukesh’s Father Credits Indian Grandmaster for Son's World Chess Championship Victory

Dec 22, 2024 - Hindustan Times

D Gukesh, an 18-year-old chess prodigy, has made history by becoming the youngest-ever world chess champion, defeating Ding Liren in Singapore. His father acknowledges a senior Indian Grandmaster's significant influence on Gukesh's success.

  • D Gukesh won the World Chess Championship at just 18 years old.
  • His victory was against defending champion Ding Liren.
  • Gukesh’s father attributed part of his son’s success to Grandmaster Harikrishna.
  • Gukesh trained intensely with Harikrishna, which helped boost his performance.
  • The chess community has reacted positively to Gukesh's victory.
“Hari was kind enough to invite Gukesh to his home after he crossed 2650. I believe that one week of intense camp at Hari’s place played a big role in Gukesh’s growth back then.” - Rajnikanth, Gukesh's father.

Gukesh's win marks a significant achievement in Indian chess and has sparked conversations about his future in the sport.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: The Top 10 F1 drivers of 2024 – as chosen by the drivers - Formula 1
item.description:
Exclusive: The Top 10 F1 Drivers of 2024 as Voted by Their Peers

Date: 4 hours ago | Source: Formula 1

Max Verstappen achieved a remarkable feat by being voted the driver of the year for the fourth consecutive time in a poll conducted among his fellow racers.

  • The poll ranked the top 10 drivers based on votes and the F1 points system.
  • Verstappen received votes from eight drivers placing him at the top, and all participants included him in their top four.
  • Lando Norris and Charles Leclerc followed Verstappen in the rankings.
  • Sergio Perez dropped out of the top 10 following a disappointing end to his season.
  • New entries in the top 10 included George Russell at P4 and Nico Hulkenberg at P8.
“Verstappen… comfortably won the poll…”

This year's poll is indicative of consistent performances and the shifting dynamics among the drivers, as seen by the rise of rookie Oscar Piastri and the fall of veteran Lewis Hamilton to the 10th position.

item.title: England name squads for India tour and Champions Trophy 2025 - ICC Cricket
item.description:
England Name Squads for India Tour and Champions Trophy 2025

Publication Date: Current | Source: Not Specified

Before heading to the Champions Trophy 2025 in February and March, England will visit India for a series of T20I and ODI matches starting on 22 January.

The white-ball squads, led by skipper Jos Buttler, feature a mix of youth and experience with notable selections including:

  • Five T20I matches starting in Kolkata on 22 January.
  • Three ODIs scheduled between 6 to 12 February.
  • Root selected only for ODIs and the Champions Trophy.
  • 20-year-old spinner Rehan Ahmed included in T20I squad.
“England will travel to India on 17 January.”

Full Schedule:

  • 1st T20I: Wednesday 22 January, Eden Gardens, Kolkata
  • 2nd T20I: Saturday 25 January, MA Chidambaram Stadium, Chennai
  • 3rd T20I: Tuesday 28 January, Niranjan Shah Stadium, Rajkot
  • 4th T20I: Friday 31 January, MCA Stadium, Pune
  • 5th T20I: Sunday 2 February, Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai
  • 1st ODI: Thursday 6 February, VCA Stadium, Nagpur
  • 2nd ODI: Sunday 9 February, Barabati Stadium, Cuttack
  • 3rd ODI: Wednesday 12 February, Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad

More details on the ICC Men’s Champions Trophy 2025 schedule will be announced later.
